TestSet.Name: quotactl
TestSet.GlobalHeader:
#define DO_EXPAND(VAL) VAL ## 1 #define EXPAND(VAL) DO_EXPAND(VAL)
#if EXPAND(HAVE_XFS_H) == 1 EmptyTestSet(xfs, quotactl, Unsupported, "XFS header file is not found in the system. Please install the xfslibs-dev package.") #elif QUOTA_ENABLED != 1 EmptyTestSet(xfs, quotactl, Unsupported, "quota-tools are not installed.") #else

Test.Name: QuotactlXQuotaOn
Test.Description: Turn on quotas for an XFS file system.

Test.Name: QuotactlXSetGetQuota
Test.Description: Set and get disk quota limits and current usage for user id.

Test.Name: QuotactlXQstat
Test.Description: Returns an fs_quota_stat structure containing XFS file system specific quota information.

Test.Name: QuotactlXQuotaOff
Test.Description: Turn off quotas for an XFS file system.

Test.Name: QuotactlXQuotaRm
Test.Description: Free the disk space taken by disk quotas. Quotas must have already been turned off.
